translations: n.海上抢劫，海盗行为；盗版，非法复制（或销售）；（电视或广播节目的）非法播出，非法制作电视（或广播）节目；抢劫行为，劫持行为，劫机

sentences.sentence: Seven of the fishermen have been formally charged with piracy.
sentences.translation: 其中7名渔民已被正式指控犯有海盗罪。

sentences.sentence: Recently, piracy has become a hot topic under discussion.
sentences.translation: 近来，盗版成为人们讨论的热门话题。

sentences.sentence: He no longer took an interest in war, nor even in piracy.
sentences.translation: 什么战争什么海盗的，他都不再感兴趣了。
